title: Weathering with You
author: Makoto Shinkai
description: A magical tale about a runaway high school boy and a girl who can control the weather. Their powers come at a steep price.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones. Tiny changes, remarkable results.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut is the last chance to save Earth from disaster. Can he solve an impossible scientific mystery?

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A shocking psychological thriller of a woman's act of violence against her husbandâ€”and of the therapist obsessed with uncovering her motive.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of the boy Paul Atreides, heir to a noble family tasked with ruling an inhospitable world where the only thing of value is the 'spice' melange, a drug capable of extending life and enhancing consciousness.
